import java.util.Scanner;

public class Sum {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
    Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.println("请输入十进制整数:");
    int a = s.nextInt();
    int sum = 0;
    do{
    	sum = sum + a % 10;
    	a = a / 10;
    }while(a != 0);
    
    System.out.println("输出各位数字之和:" + sum);
    
    s.close();
	}

}
